Back to Franz Liszt

Franz Liszt

Wilde Jagd (Scherzo), S. 176a

1851 · LW – · R. –

This piece exists in a later version: the Scherzo und Marsch (S. 177; LW A174; R. 20). Liszt re-used the title Wilde Jagd for the eighth of the Douze Études d’exécution transcendante (S. 139; LW A172; R. 2b).

Recommended editions

  • New Liszt Edition (Editio Musica Budapest) · Suppl. 10 · Z. A/B 14505 · ed. Adrienne Kaczmarczyk / Ágnes Sas

Duration: 15' 30"

Difficulty: 5
